title: China is in "hot water"-Part 1: big blasts, Electric car factories catch major fires/victims unknown
description:
#Chinainsights#Chinanewstoday
It was 10:30 a.m. on July 1, 2023, when a chemical plant in China had a silicone oil fire that triggered an explosion. The scene was like a disaster scene in a blockbuster movie. Mushroom clouds rose into the air. 

Have questions? Do you have something to share with us about China? We want to hear from you!
